project_descr:
Promoting Sustainable Development of Chinese Enterprises for "Going Out" 
In co-operation with CAITEC and SASAC's Research Center, UNDP China will jointly compile a report on the overseas development of Chinese companies.

outputs.output_descr: The cooperation with China Minmetals on CSR project for Policy Recommendation Report

To address the key challenges encountered by Chinese companies, and to cultivate a culture of corporate citizenship, UNDP, CAITEC under MOFCOM, and the Research Center of SASAC will jointly implement the project Promoting Sustainable Development of Chinese Enterprises for "Going Out".  The partners will jointly compile a report on the overseas development of Chinese companies, including survey of hundreds of overseas Chinese enterprises. Based on the report, relevant advocacy activities will be initiated to build Chinese enterprises' capacity to  to better respond to challenges stemming from o

project_title: promoting sustainable development of chinese enterprises
